basics.name: Muhamad Shafiq bin Sofian
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary:
As a Product Development Engineer, I specialize in frontend web development, contributing my skills and expertise to create engaging and user-friendly interfaces. 
My role extends beyond traditional web development, as I actively participate in diverse projects related to the Internet of Things (IoT). I bring a dynamic blend of technical proficiency and innovative problem-solving to the field, consistently driving projects forward and ensuring successful outcomes in both frontend design and IoT implementations.

work.name: YTL Communications Sdn Bhd
work.summary: Currently working as maintainer an existing system and get involved in various kind of projects related to 5G and IIOT
highlights: Works on bug fix, improvement, and change request on existing applications

work.name: Linear DMS Solutions Sdn Bhd
work.summary: Designing, maintaning and develop an IOT platform for smart home to market as SAAS
highlights: Developed and maintained an existing application

work.name: Linear DMS Solutions Sdn Bhd
work.summary: As a graduate intern I just came in absorb all knowledge as much as can
highlights: Introduced frontend development using AngularJS & Angular 8
Built an algorithm to calculate air-conditioner power consumption based on real-time data

projects.name: @Nodus Virtual Thermostat Manager
projects.description: An air-conditioner smart control manager. Main objective to avoid over-cooling and over-power use while maintaining comfort
highlights: A complex algorithm is dealing with the internal temperature versus the external temperature sensor
Fine-tune some parameters by looking at previous data to provide better results
Provide an API to allow integration with web and mobile platforms

projects.name: @Nodus Air-conditioner Analysis
projects.description: An air-conditioner power consumption estimation algorithm
highlights: Power consumption estimated based on real-time incoming data from A/C
Accurancy about 70%, incompleted verification because of insufficient data
